caption.p: Effect of expanding antiretroviral therapy coverage ( ART) on HIV incidence among people who inject drugs ( PWID) and their heterosexual sex partners in the Middle East and North Africa ( MENA). The graphs display, at various ART coverage levels, the number of new HIV infections and the number of infections averted in comparison with baseline (current year) estimations of HIV incidence among PWID and their heterosexual sex partners.
